After getting Legacy's message, Quickstride and Rat Trap look at each other=
.  Quickstride shrugs.

"Oooops, okaaaay, so I might have messed up a littl=
e bit."

Rat Trap does the same.

"So did I, don't feel bad.  Okay Legacy w=
e read ya, thanks for the word up...  I wonder why they're lettn' the snake=
 go?"

Quickstride shrugs again.

"I dunno. Strange isn't it?"

They both g=
et into robot mode and continue toward the CR chamber where Tucson had firs=
t exited to begin his quest to finding Rodimus.  Rat Trap spots familliar b=
attery fluid.

"Look at this, battery fluid, I know where that came from.  =
Wheels... He must've been here a while ago...  He kinda did mention somethn=
' about Kenzo... "  

They make their room Kenzo's med bay, as they follow =
the tiny spatters of battery fluid that lead them right to where Tucson had=
 been just moments ago.

Quickstride spots Kenzo and Depthcharge with ears =
forward.

"Wow, it's been a long time since we last saw ya sir.  Welcome ba=
ck."

They both salute Depthcharge.
